text:
Use the new propertyset data type in Ant 1.6.

With a recent nightly build try

<property file="module-local-properties" prefix="junit.module.props"/>

<junit ...>
  <sypropertyset>
    <propertyref prefix="junit.module.props"/>
  </syspropertyset>
  ...
